segments.text: Excuse me , I'm a little lost . Which bus do I take to get to Shi Da ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's see . From here , you have to take the 278 bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh OK , where do I get off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should get off at the first Shi Da stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's quite simple . When you get on , just ask the bus driver when to pay the fare and where you want to get off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Only 15 NT per section . Oh look , that is your bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , I can't thank you enough .
segments.speaker: S1
